inclusion.criterion: Having Prader-Willi Syndrome and being between ages 8-15 years.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Being obese and between ages 8-11 years.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Obese children without Prader-Willi Syndrome currently on lipid-lowering medication, diabetes medications, or blood pressure medications.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple comorbidities, including COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status at home.
